title: Raising Funds for Orlando Victims #OneLove #StayStrongOrlando $10,000 Goal!

embed.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem.

body: Raising funds for the Orlando shooting victims. Come support the cause @ https://www.twitch.tv/wolfsone_gaming and track our progress towards our goal of 10,000 USD which will be donated to the Victims of Pulse Shooting Fund. Show your love and support!

replies.body: All I can afford to send is prayers(I know it doesn't have an earthly value but it does have a spiritual value and that is something that they also need)

> [{quoted}](name=Tamur,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pbv7jkEb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-12T22:22:29.084+0000)
>
> All I can afford to send is prayers(I know it doesn't have an earthly value but it does have a spiritual value and that is something that they also need)

Bump this post and let's get it rolling for the victims and their families!
As a gay man who plays this game, I really appreciate this.

> [{quoted}](name=MortonSaltBoy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pbv7jkEb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-12T22:15:36.902+0000)
>
> As a gay man who plays this game, I really appreciate this.

The more traction we get the more we can do to help! Help me get the word out brother! Much love!
Its such a nice thing your doing this.

> [{quoted}](name=DeadlyStalker,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pbv7jkEb,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-12T21:55:52.666+0000)
>
> Hes not paying for it...

No, but he's raising money. He's still helping the cause.

> [{quoted}](name=Metal Gear Roses,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pbv7jkEb,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-12T22:01:36.641+0000)
>
> No, but he's raising money. He's still helping the cause.

I have already donated $20.00 USD and I don't have any money to give. I gave it anyways. I hope you can get behind this as well.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
Events like this is when people take advantage of it with donations and funding.

I've been scammed before. So be wary.

Not to say he's scamming but always make sure it's legit before donating.

People make a fund me page and actually have it set up to their paypal lol and then disappear off the internet.

> [{quoted}](name=x R e n g a R x,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pbv7jkEb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-12T22:19:12.689+0000)
>
> Events like this is when people take advantage of it with donations and funding.
> 
> I've been scammed before. So be wary.
> 
> Not to say he's scamming but always make sure it's legit before donating.
> 
> People make a fund me page and actually have it set up to their paypal lol and then disappear off the internet.

The link he's supplied goes to the official gofundme for the crisis, not one that he's set up for his stream.

> [{quoted}](name=x R e n g a R x,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pbv7jkEb,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-12T22:19:12.689+0000)
>
> Events like this is when people take advantage of it with donations and funding.
> 
> I've been scammed before. So be wary.
> 
> Not to say he's scamming but always make sure it's legit before donating.
> 
> People make a fund me page and actually have it set up to their paypal lol and then disappear off the internet.

I appreciate you bringing that up. I wouldn't be able to live with myself and it would infuriate me if someone did take advantage of these people. I am just trying to raise awareness and help. This is the email response and that is my RL name.

June 12, 2016
 
Dear Scott Vosler,
 
Thank you for your generous donation to:
Support Victims of Pulse Shooting
 
The amount of your donation is:
$20.00
 
Make Anonymous   Edit Comment

0 Donations for the Victims of the Orlando incident in 8 hours of play... Guess it doesn't matter that much to people. Good night! Pick it up again later I suppose. Try again.

PS: my brother and I were the only ones to donate to the fundraiser.
